name: Flying Zombies
description:
Flying Zombies GameDev.TV game jam submission

Protect yourself against falling zombies in case they get to you just revive and upgrade yourself.

Came up with idea for game 2 days ago.


Each zombie that dies makes rest of the remaining zombies stronger.

After you get overwhelmed by zombies you have a chance to become stronger and start all over again.

Credits:

used models from Kenney.nl

Animations from mixamo.com

Audio from OpenGameArt.org

Some textures from Unity Asset Store

Font from 1001fonts.com

Source: https://github.com/abatkovs/GameDevTvJam2022
